title: Riser block

claims.preamble: I claim the ornamental design for a riser block, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a left side perspective view of a riser block;
FIG. 2 is a front elevational view of FIG. 1;
FIG. 3 is a rear elevational view of FIG. 1;
FIG. 4 is a right side elevational view of FIG. 1;
FIG. 5 is a left side elevational view of FIG. 1;
FIG. 6 is a top plan view of FIG. 1; and,
FIG. 7 is a bottom plan view of FIG. 1.
